title: Vi "buffs", are you kidding me?

embed.description: WIP !] [STATUS: PBE is currently offline.] The PBE has been updated! As we start the 8.8 PBE cycle, today's patch includes Conqueror Varus, new chromas for Dragon Master Swain and Badlands Baron Rumble, and more! Continue reading for more information!

body:
hi.
On the PBE Vi recieved her well deserved buffs. After months of getting destroyed by legit every other jungler in the game, not having fun against meta BS like skarner and WW, she finally got "buffs".
so lets look into it: 
Vi

    Vault Breaker (Q)
        Cooldown lowered from 16/14/12/10/8 to 12/11/10/9/8
        Cost lowered from 50/60/70/80/90 to 30/45/60/75/90
    Denting Blows (W) attack speed changed from 30/35/40/45/50% to 15/25/35/45/55%
    Excessive Force (E)
        Ammo recharge time lowered from 14/12.5/11/9.5/8 to 12/11/10/9/8
        mana cost lowered from 40/45/50/55/60 to 30/35/40/45/50

honestly, this is a total joke. this does nothing. no, it even makes things worse than before.
1. 2 secs lower cd on q and e does nothing on ganking and barely helps your clear.
2. Vi had never mana issues in the jungle, esp. after tier 2 jungle item.
3. losing 15% attack speed early game slows down your clear A LOT.

in conclusion: she got nerfed in the early game, cause noone maxes W first. well played.

Dear Riot, we Vi mains know, that you completly forgot our champion after you released Camille aka Vi 2.0, who has the bigger plays, the better utulity the better stats. Camille is legit better than Vi in everything (Top and Jungle) but jungle clear speed. 

When you really nerf her last strength against Camille, you can put her on top of your GU list.

replies.body: these are experimental changes designed to test if she can function in top lane that are separate from regular gameplay changes (read: standard buffs/nerfs to numbers)

if u want to buff lane vi, how about u give her tools to actually survive top. her shield is absolute garbage compared to 99% of top laners and their ways to win top. Ranged champs have ranged. She has no sustain, compared to quite a few toplaners. Her shield is not on demand, and in fact requires her to not use an ability in the minion wave, making it even worse if u wanna use it strategically. She has no defense steroids, like poppy or garen's W passives. She will never survive top lane even if she could push well, simply because any poke is immediately denied. Just look at camille. Shield is only physical or magical, but most top laners stick to 1 damage source. Also, only procs when she goes in, aka, when it matters, and she even has a heal still. 

And as for jax, the champ that has no defense steroid (until R), he has a dodge, which is very good in top, and he is very busted right now simply due to his dueling power. Simply put, Vi doesnt need buffs to numbers to go top. She needs actual tools to live it. 

Might as well try to make her a mid laner.
I'd honestly like to see her Q be less telegraphed (ie a much faster charge) at the cost of a decent damage nerf.

Vi will never be a top laner until she has tools to outplay lane opponents. Her Q is incredibly predictable and a lot of the current top laner roster can either play around it or they're a juggernaut, and in the case of the latter she just automatically loses because it's impossible for her to win a trade vs a juggernaut.

She was designed to be a top laner, but wound up being way better in the jungle.

She was only played top for a week after release because of the initial video.

As someone who was not around when she was released but has always wanted to play her, I do appreciate your attempt to make her viable top. I think the big problem she has as a top laner is her lack of sustain. Vi has the same survivability method as Riven, where you get one shield to block the core trade damage. However Riven has her shield up much more quickly, and easily, and it flows in her kit very well. The issue with Vi top is she doesn't have access to her shield on demand, and as such can't sustain well in top lane. I think some sort of health regen buff/shield modification would work better.

But I didn't go to balance school so please don't roast me alive I just wanna play Vi top.

This is legitimately the first sentence I've ever seen a Rioter type that doesn't start with a capital letter.

Just thought I'd put that out there. No hate.

As someone who wants a lot Vi to be viable top, I think that this changes won't help. **I think it should be nice if you guys work a little more with her passive**, maybe reducing the cooldown of the shield everytime she procs her W on a champion? This will help her to survive on top match-ups. **Her W doesn't need change at all,** nerfing her early game attack speed will just slow her jungle clear and make her a worst skirmisher (she already had her base attack speed gutted some time ago). 

Also, you can make her E harass a little more stronger in lane (maybe dealing a bonus damage if the shockwave hits a champion?). I really want her to become a worth pick on top lane, but this changes are really weird, so I think you guys can think a little better on how to make this decision it work.

Then, I would recommend at least keeping everything *but* the W nerf......or at least give it some compensation against monsters. Yes, you said they're experimental, so they may not even go through, but if there is even a chance that they may go through, that W nerf is going to hit her alot harder than the buffs will.

So......maybe reduce the attack speed scaling at later levels, but double it against monsters, that way it's around the same as it is now. Her W never really comes into play while diving, anyway, since you rely more on your abilities than your autos in a fight.
Agree with doubling the boost against monsters. Disagree about using auto-attacks while diving, she does more than just dive, and the attack speed comes in handy, I wouldn't discount it so much.

Vi's kit isn't suited for top lane though. She's more suited for hard-dives than extended fights. She doesn't sustain particularely well since her shield requires her to engage (i.e. she cannot play defensively in a bad matchup). Her mobility and engage tool is extremely telegraphed unless she's in melee range of her target. And her tools are just limited compared to other toplaners. Please look at these changes and tell me if she's ever going to be able to win a lane against a tank or any bruiser because they won't. Vi is a very all-or-nothing champion, and that lack of depth also makes her very feast-or-famine. I'm sad to say this but Vi needs a GU.

it does the opposite of what you say since its reduce her attack speed. Her W synchs well with Onhit items and you are making it worst by encouraging to build what Vi usually builds so you are not improving her diversity
Can you do this for nidalee too? I really want to play her top again like the good ole days.

For toplane, the main issue is the overall state of the game and situation for fighters, it's just very hard to have impact later on as their teamfiighting is poor(unless they have absurd kits llike the initiation tank/fighter/assasin that is camil) and atleast in soloQ, splitpushing isn't all that viable as it requires the other 4 man to actually apply pressure so you're opponents can't just gang up on you without loosing something in return.

As for beeinf viable in the laneing phase, i think the Q manacost and cdr buffs are pretty important, allowing her to trade more often and with a lower window of vulnerbillity since her Q also is her escape.
The E buffs are not the best idea, if her E is spamable, it quickly leads to toxic laneing patterns on her where she maxes E, spams it in the wave for harras while also clearing it with not to much answers for her opponent.
Asides from that, she could use either a bit more durabillity, either base stats or buffs to her passive, or a  bit more mobillity, like a small stacking up ms boost on her W, like 5% for 3 sec whenever you proc it, stacking up to 3 times.
The most important buff she(and many other fighters) needs however, is switching some of her **bonus **AD-ratio into **total** ad-ratios. It would help keeping her damage more relevant in the late without overbuffing the early, and most off all it would make Steraks more viable for her.
Non juggernaut fighters currently lack their own itemisation, they rely on Trinity, juggernaut items and in somecases assasin items, but the most important juggernaut item(steraks) is not that great on them as they usually have bonus ad ratios rather than total.
It feels like Steraks is mandatory for fighters to be viable in teamfights, it prevents them from beeing burst down while also helpping vs the CC chain(though not that great as there is to much cc that isn't affected by tenacitiy and the overall cc-uptime is to damn high even with tenacity)


While i really appriciate that you want to help out toplane VI, please make sure that it doesn#t come at the cost of jungle VI. As others said, 15% as from the rank 1 W is quite a hit to her early clear times.

_Edit: just saw the base stat change, the base AS might actually keep her early clears close to live._

Also, maybe consider changeing steraks a bit. Imo it's an item ment to enable teamfigting on champs that naturally do well 1v1 but struggle in temifghts(so fighters), but right now it's also really powerfull 1v1 and they still are a bit lacking in teamfights.
So how about haveing the shield and tenacity scale in some way with the number of nearby enemies?
Also, is it really neccesary to have steraks and maw shar thier passive? It really limits fighter itemisation and the main abusers of that combo were adc, but steraks is now melee only.
Honestly as someone who likes playing Vi top I'm really hoping these changes go through, it would make her a lot more viable and fun in lane!

I'm just a pleb with no balance degree, But how about giving her Q a small refund for hitting champs? I think this rewards good Vi's and gives her a chance to escape (tank damage after a successful engage they have an option to q out). Having the CD only proc on champs so her clear doesnt get too ridiculous.

And for the passive, after reading Twin Tails comment, why not increase the size of the shield but have it only proc on champs and large monsters?

Maybe even throw in some AD scaling to help warrior vi
